title: colors
description: Personalize your nickname with a custom color.

options.custom: change your nickname color, the format is #RRGGBB.

colorIncorrect.title: 🚫 Oops! Something went wrong with the color...
colorIncorrect.description: It looks like the color you entered isn't correct. Make sure to use a valid hexadecimal format like `#FF5733`. Give it another try! 🎨

roleError.title: ⛔ Oops! Could not create role!
roleError.description:
It looks like we couldn't create the role you requested. Don't worry! Here's what might have happened:** Possible causes:** Possible causes:** Possible causes:** Possible causes:** Possible causes:** Possible causes:** Possible causes:** Possible causes:** Possible causes:** Possible causes:** Possible causes:** Possible causes:** Possible causes:** Possible causes:** Possible causes:** Possible causes:** Possible causes. You do not have sufficient permissions. The bot does not have 'Manage Roles' permissions.3. The requested role is above the bot's role.
3. How can you fix it?
Check your permissions or the bot's permissions.
3. Make sure the bot's role is in the correct position.
4.
roleError.footer: ⚙️ We're here to help! Contact the administrator if you need further assistance.

initColorPointer.title: 🎨 The Color Module is Disabled!
initColorPointer.description: Hey, are you an admin? 🌟 Click **Start** to set up and activate the color module. Bring some life to the server! 🌈

firstExecution.title: ✅ Role successfully created!
firstExecution.description:
Great!
**✨ This is your new Color Pointer <slot_0>, enjoy it!**

 now you can configure the position of the role manually in the settings server.

**Done!** execute /colors custom for change the color of your nickname.

settingMenu.title: ⚙️ Settings
settingMenu.description:
Here’s everything you need to know about where settings the command /colors.

What can you do?
1. Change the color default collection.
2. Remove the Color with uses.
3. Change the position of the roles automatically. 

 And more!

colorCreate.title: ✅ Role successfully created!
colorCreate.description:
Great!
**✨ This is your new color <slot_0>, enjoy it!**

menu.title: Colors Menu
menu.description:
Here’s everything you need to know about your role and the options to customize it to your liking.

**🌟 Your Current Role:**
- **Role Name:** <slot_0>
- **Current Color:** <slot_1>

**🎨 What Can You Do?**
1. Change the color of your **nick** using `/colors custom` or explore options with `/colors menu`.
2. If you prefer, you can also remove the color whenever you want.

Make your profile look just the way you want! 😄
